snippet: West Virginia adopts new education standards that encourage students to debate climate change.
abstract: West Virginia State Board of Education adopts additional changes to state's version of Next Generation Science Standards, teaching guidelines developed by 26 states that reflect overwhelming scientific consensus that climate change is occurring; latest changes suggest students should develop skills needed to debate scientific issues, calming uproar over earlier changes based on skepticism about scientific veracity of climate change.
lead_paragraph: West Virginia adopts new education standards that encourage students to debate climate change.

headline.main: State Again Sets Changes for Schools on Climate
headline.print_headline: State Again Sets Changes for Schools on Climate
